pullRequest.title: Fix the Kafka cluster resource list
pullRequest.bodyText:
Type of change

Documentation

Description
This PR fixes some missing resources in the resource list for Kafka clusters. To improve the readability of the long list it also splits them into subsections by component.
PS: The weird no changes file seems to be some weird file without name and content which showed up in the repo and which I'm just deleting.
Checklist

 Update documentation

commit.message:
Fix some minor bugs in the Kafka cluster resources list

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Fix some last typos

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

nodes.bodyText: It's used to sign the client's private key so it's used to verify the identity of Kafka clients (during mutual authentication), or?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,7 +7,31 @@
 
 The following resources will created by the Cluster Operator in the Kubernetes cluster:
 
+.Shared resources
+
+`_cluster-name_-cluster-ca`:: Secret with the Cluster CA used to encrypt the cluster communication.
+`_cluster-name_-cluster-ca-cert`:: Secret with the Cluster CA public key. This key can be used to verify the identity of the Kafka brokers.
+`_cluster-name_-clients-ca`::  Secret with the Clients CA used to encrypt the communication between Kafka brokers and Kafka clients.
+`_cluster-name_-clients-ca-cert`:: Secret with the Clients CA public key. This key can be used to verify the identity of the Kafka brokers.

nodes.bodyText: it's strange having two entries with the same name here but then they are different in terms of type (Secret vs Service) but you understand that in the description. I am not saying that we should do it or right now, but maybe having a table with "resource name", "kind" and "description" could be better? WDYT?
